sections.text:
Author Correction: Genome-wide meta-analysis of brain volume identifies genomic loci and genes shared with intelligence Philip R. Jansen , Mats Nagel , Kyoko Watanabe , Yongbin Wei, Jeanne E. Savage ,
Christiaan A. de Leeuw , Martijn P. van den Heuvel , Sophie van der Sluis & Danielle Posthuma
Correction to: Nature Communications https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-020-19378-5, published online 5 November 2020.
In this article the grant number ERC-2018-AdG GWAS2FUNC 834057 relating to European Research Council for Danielle Posthuma was omitted. The original article has been corrected.
